name: JUST A PARENT LIVING WITH ESTRANGEMENT

episodes.title: Is ESTRANGEMENT Like a Cult?
episodes.description:
I'm going to tell you about a video that one of my viewers recommended. It's a fascinating comparison of estrangement and being in a cult. All the details are below.

#estrangementawareness #adultchild #adultoffspring 

The Channel: Families Divided TV
The Video: "Cult of one: Role of a Wife in a Son's Decision to end Contact with his Parents: https://youtu.be/W_1Ivvy1oHk?si=3dRj5xzPTtD98rnH
The Doctor: Dr. Joshua Coleman 
The Book: "Rules of Estrangement" 
Available on Amazon 
Links

https://amzn.to/4fCwOe5 Paperback
